pages.text: The Taglock is yet another essential tool.$(br)It can gather an entity's hair, blood, and all things needed to establish a connection.$(br)To gather a Taglock from an entity, either sneak up from behind or search for their Bed.$(br2)To gather a Taglock from a Bed, use the Taglock while sneaking so you don't accidentally sleep.
Recipes that require a Taglock will usually assume that this Taglock has already been bound.
